Egypt has some really cool cities. Check it out!
Giza
This city is the site of some of the most impressive ancient monuments in the world!
Alexandria
Known for its history and beaches, Alexandria is one of Egypt's most famous tourist destnations.
Luxor
Located east of the Nile River, this city is is a mark of ancient Egyptian culture.

Food
While Egypt’s numerous tourist attractions are a good enough reason to travel to the country, Egyptian cuisine is another reason to visit. Though everyone knows about kebab and falafel, there’s much more to it and if you are traveling to Egypt it would be a real pity to miss out.These are some of the most famous dishes in Egypt!
